participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Energetic and fitness-oriented, Jake enjoys staying active and often engages in workouts to combat boredom. He is friendly and approachable, often looking for ways to engage with others.
participant_1.background: Eating is something I do when I'm bored. I like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. I have short hair. Two dogs live with me. I go to the gym regularly.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Resilient and introspective, Emily has a strong sense of responsibility and values her family deeply. She tends to be reflective about her past experiences and is motivated to build a better future.
participant_2.background: My father is in the army. I recently was fired and had to get a new job. I work in the insurance business. My mom passed away when I was young.
